name: SLUGSHOT
description:
Ever wonder what it'd be like to be 1 inch tall and take on the challenges of the world? See the world differently through much smaller eyes. Confront and eliminate pesky foes throughout your outdoor journey. SlugShot is one adventure you do not want to miss out on.
